name: WP Brand Logo Slider
author: Hasibul Islam Badsha

sections.description:
WP Brand Logo Slider is a wordpress plugin to display your brand logo or client logo on your WordPress website! Use this shortcode [WPBLS-SLIDER] in the post/page” where you want to brand logo.

Official Documentation: http://www.e2soft.com/blog/wp-brand-logo-slider/

  • Live Demo
  • Need Help?
  • About Author

Video Tutorial

You can select/change

  • Display order.
  • Border area/color/radius.
  • Auto Play on/off.
  • Display/Visible items.
  • Background color.
  • Number of item scrool.
  • Pause on hover yes/no.
  • All are dynamic.

You can make my day by submitting a positive review on WordPress.org!

Usage

  • Go to your Dashboard after installation and navigate to “Brands >> Brand Settings” to configure the brand logo or client logo.

Features

  • Very easy installation
  • Unlimited color variation by using jQuery color picker
  • Shortcode System
  • Plugin tested with IE6+, FF 20+, Chrome, Safari
  • Custom post supported
  • Flexible and easy to use
  • Lightweight JQuery
  • Responsive Design
  • Auto On/Off
  • Options Settings Pannel
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-breaking-news-ticker to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Just copy and paste if(function_exists(‘wpbls_brand_loop_slider’)){wpbls_brand_loop();} in template code or [WPBLS-SLIDER] in the post/page” where you want to display brand logo or client logo.
sections.faq:
Can it possible to use throw shordcode?

Yes.

Could it possible to places this ticker on post or page?

Yes.

  • Initial version.
